parameters.text: ERROR: This script has no conditional logic to check if currentTabTitle contains 'deepseek'. It will blindly cycle through tabs and extract content from wrong pages. The script needs IF/THEN logic: IF title contains 'deepseek' THEN extract content, ELSE cycle to next tab.
